author: Bonnie K Aldinger
content:
Oh, Rick.

I don’t think I knew that Karen was there that day too. I am so glad she made it out safely and that a tug took her safely home to you and your family.

author: Ray Pellecchia
content: Rick – Thank you for sharing that. I am a former colleague of your wife and also experienced 9/11 from lower Manhattan. I had never know all this about the boatlift, and it is a moving and uplifting story.
